metadata.Title: CVE-2021-39261 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A crafted NTFS image can cause a heap-based buffer overflow in ntfs_compressed_pwrite in NTFS-3G < 2021.8.22.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-39261` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libntfs-3g88 - 1:2017.3.23-2ubuntu0.18.04.3
ntfs-3g - 1:2017.3.23-2ubuntu0.18.04.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ntfs-3g package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2017.3.23-2ubuntu0.18.04.3').
